button.label: Auto Merge
button.supertip: Automatically merges and formats the selected cells.
Adds a header to the top of the workpaper.
Adds a hyperlink between the selected cell and the next selected cell.
Clears all hyperlinks in the selected cells.

button.label: Benford Test
button.supertip: Performs a Benford test on the selected data, outputting the results to a new tab.

button.label: Gap Analysis
button.supertip: Performs a gap analysis on the selected data.

button.label: Compare Values
button.supertip: Compares the values in two columns, highlighting unique items.

button.label: Remove Styles
button.supertip: Removes all but the default set of styles, any styles in use other than those will revert to using the Normal style.

button.label: QB TB Clean
button.supertip: Prepares a trial balance exported from QuickBooks to be imported into Engagement.

button.label: Replace Functions
button.supertip: Replaces all non-standard functions in the selection with their values.
